short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly open your live ports without hassle!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows you to bookmark your most used ports for easy access. You can add ports with custom URLs to cover all development environments.

Features:
• Lightweight
• Easy to use
• Show favorite bookmarks
• Save and backup your existing bookmarks to a JSON file
• Upload a JSON file to populate your bookmarks

Github: https://github.com/calmhand
